mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM User WHERE email = #{email})
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM User WHERE user_id = #{userId})
SELECT password_hash FROM User WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT name FROM User WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT user_id, name, email FROM User WHERE ( /* 1. ID 또는 이름에 검색어가 포함된 경우 (Partial Match) */ user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND user_id != #{myUserId} /* 2. 도메인 규칙: 검색 결과에서 본인은 제외 */ AND deleted_at IS NULL /* 3. 도메인 규칙: 탈퇴하지 않은(deleted_at이 NULL인) 유저만 검색 */ ORDER BY name ASC
